text:
e="preserve"> was a Japanese voice actor. His best known works were Shinnosuke's father Hiroshi Nohara in the long-running anime series "Crayon Shin-chan", Maes Hughes in "Fullmetal Alchemist", Holland in "Eureka Seven", Axel in "Kingdom Hearts", Leorio
in "Hunter x Hunter", Shiro Fujimoto in "Ao no Exorcist" and Esidisi in '.
In the live action, he was mostly known for dubbing actor Robert Downey Jr. as Tony Stark.
Fujiwara died, aged 55 of cancer on April 12, 2020.
